item.title: Errata
item.description: Errata in the slides shown in the videos Chapter 1.4 (Models & Parameters) - slide 5/10: d-dimensional vector, not p-dimensional Chapter 4.3 (Simple Measures for Classification) - slide 6/9: Error in cost matrix Chapter 4.4 (Perfomance Evaluation: Test Error) - slide 8/13: The variance of MSE decreases with test set size, not the mean of MSE Chapter 5.2 (CART: Splitting Criteria) - slide 12/12: Error in result of Gini Chapter 6.
